description:
Parenting is harder than you think. 
So, we help you to analyze baby's emotion from baby cry.
Please use it when you are having trouble with a crying baby.
You can understand why your baby is crying.

Join over 3 million users worldwide with our innovative app that analyzes crying sounds. 
Enjoy free access by watching ads, or subscribe for an ad-free experience.

◆Topics
We have increased the number of languages supported in the app.
The supported languages are
- Arabic
- Chinese
- English
- French
- German
- Hindi
- Indonesian
- Italian
- Japanese
- Korean
- Portuguese
- Russian
- Spanish
- Thai
- Turkish
- Urdu

◆Cryanalyzer is useful for such parent
〇 We want to know baby needs sleep or milk or breastfeed timing.
〇 We want to know the reason the baby is crying is growing pain or disturbation of life rhythm and so on.
〇 Baby does not sleep with a sleep sound

◆Cry Analyzers, it is over 80% accurate for identifying a baby’s emotional state from baby cry and predicts why a baby is crying.
〇 Recorded and analyzed more than 20,000 sounds of a crying baby
〇 The accuracy of this APP is over 80%.

●Age range of accuracy●
Recommended age for newborn 0-6months and you can use this APP until 2 years old.

◆Reliable Infant rearing APP◆
〇 FIRSTASCENT INC. provides the “Cry Analyzer“. FIRSTASCENT INC. has conducted collaborative research on children’s life style, baby growth and development with the National Center for Child Health and Development (NCCHD). NCCHD is the only specialized research institution for pediatric healthcare in Japan.
FIRSTASCENT INC. has developed an algorithm that records and analyzes more than 20,000 different crying baby sounds.

◆Is your baby hungry? Is your baby sleepy? You can easily figure out what your baby request ◆
〇 The APP records the pitch and frequency of baby cry to predict the emotional state of a baby. The APP will analyze the emotional state why the baby is crying, and then display the analyzed percentage on your smartphone. It would tell you breastfeeding time.
〇 You can easily understand a baby’s request on the display.

◆The APP will personalize your baby’s crying pitch for more accuracy.◆
〇 The APP has an algorithm of the personalization. If you feed back the emotional state, it will be more accurate.

◆Tracking records◆
〇 You can track your baby’s record. It helps you to calm and smooth your upset baby.

● Cry Analyzer will help you...●
○ Your baby won’t stop crying and you don’t know what to do.
○ Your baby never stops crying at night.
○ You’ve tried feeding and burping but nothing seems to be working.
○ This APP will help you understand your babies request and allow you to calm your baby down even in public place such as busy restaurants.

===================================

■ Contacts us
If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to contact us through the form in the APP.

■Terms of Use
https://cry-analyzer.com/contents/term.html

■Privacy Policy
https://cry-analyzer.com/contents/privacy.html

===================================

Mali Daily Pregnancy & Parenting Tracker keeps track of your baby’s everyday development and your body changes, for the first 1000 days of your child’s life — from conception to the second year of age. 

Read daily tips and useful articles fully customized for you and your baby on nutrition, symptoms, body changes, baby development, activities, early childhood development, and more. All our content is tailored to a modern Asian physique and lifestyle.  




KEY FEATURES

- Daily updates of your baby's development customized to your baby’s name, gender, and age 
- Over 1,000+ tips and 300+ personalized articles
- Certified by medical doctors and developmental specialists 
- Due date calculator and countdown
- Baby Journal 
- Kick counter 
- Contraction counter 
- Weekly Baby’s size updates with illustrations
- Weight tracker based on your BMI 
- Baby growth tracker
- Milestones tracker 
- To-do lists 
- Discussions with other moms 
- Food guide 
- First Aid guide 
- General guide
- FAQ from pregnant moms
- Exclusive deals from selected brands 

About Mali
Mali was created by a group of parents, medical doctors, and educators who share the belief that the first 1,000 days are the most critical period in a child’s life. We provide trustworthy, unbiased, and medically approved information that's pleasant to consume with the goal of enriching the lives of modern Asian parents and especially those of their children.

The app was developed in collaboration with Med. Dr. Piyawut Kreetapirom (Pediatrician), Dr. Wanwadee Sapmee Panyakat (Obstetrician), Dr. Vorachai Chuenchompoonut (Obstetrician), and Ketsupar Jirakran (Developmental Specialist). Mali is operated by Mali Family Health Co. Ltd. and was initially funded by the National Innovation Agency (NIA). 

The development of the first app began in 2017. The first version was launched on Mother's Day 2018. In June 2021, Mali 2.0 was launched in English and Thai language. Today over 100,000 new parents have downloaded the app to enrich their pregnancy or parenting journey.

Contact us
Website: www.mali.me 
Email: hello@mali.me


Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/malifamilyhealth
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/malifamilyhealth/

Eolas App is a tool to help innovate the way we educate our healthcare professionals and how we care for our patients. Access specific guidelines, online learning, and other useful resources from the palm of your hand. Streamline your department's induction and departmental teaching processes and knowledge sharing to save time and make everyone's work more efficient.

app_name: Ooca ปรึกษาปัญหาใจ
description:
Wanna talk to a psychologist but you don't have any free time to go to the hospital?  OOCA, are here, the alternative choice for the tele mental health service in your phone!

OOCA is easy to use, convenient and confidential. A whole package in one app! Just download us, login, choose your personal psychiatrist or psychologist and date/time you prefer, make a payment, then BRAVO, your appointment awaits!

OOCA is a mental health service platform for the individuals and organizations. Our psychiatrists and psychologists are qualified for you and those who you care about. We believe that every problem disturbing you can be prevented and fixed. OOCA volunteers to be a part of your journey to conquer it all. 

Because you are important.

What matters to you, it’s okay, we’ll listen. 

Relationship issues, love, work-life balance, self-improvement, feeling depressed, burnout at work or school, you can try to make it better by starting a conservation with our qualified psychiatrists or psychologists just a few clicks away! 


Why OOCA?
Our mental health professionals have an array of expertise, including: 
- Licensed psychiatrists. (Verified by The Medical Council of Thailand.)
- Licensed clinical psychologists. (Verified by Thai Clinical Psychologist Association.)
- Counseling psychologist with a master’s degree or higher in counseling psychology.
***OOCA has more than 100 mental health professionals, the highest number in Thailand for the digital mental wellness platform.


Our past clients
OOCA offers services to individuals of more than 120,000 users and businesses as a mental wellness solution for employees. We are currently taking care of more than 76,000 employees of prestigious Thai corporates and companies such as Bank of Thailand, Chevron, SCG Chemicals, Kasikorn Bank and more of leading organizations in Thailand.


Who is OOCA?
OOCA is a tele mental health application from Thailand, providing counseling services via video calls with mental health professionals for individuals and corporate clients. Here at OOCA, everything will remain confidential and secured. Our goal is to make mental health topic general in our society.

We are leading progression in the health-tech start-up scene and aim to embrace technology to recreate mental-health wellness/awareness globally and look forward to bring in foreign professionals on our platform in order to provide ex-pat services and also regional expansion. 

-----------------

OOCA. It's Okay. Let's talk.

-----------------

Jurisdiction Statement: 
According to the 2017/745 (MDR) Regulation of the European Union, this application and its accompanying CGMS system have been approved for use in all EU member states, including but not limited to Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Croatia. Meanwhile, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Switzerland and Türkiye also accept MDR as the market access standard for medical devices. We are committed to providing users with health monitoring services that comply with international standards. In addition to observing the CE-MDR certification, our product has engaged sales within European Union countries Furthermore, the CE-MDR certification is also recognized as a reference standard for market readiness in the following countries, where we have established sales through local distributors: Algeria, Argentina, Australia, Belgium, Bolivia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Brazil, Colombia, Costa Rica, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, France, Germany, Greece, Guatemala, Honduras, India, Indonesia, Italy, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Libya, Lithuania, Malaysia, Maldives, Malta, Mexico, Montenegro, Morocco, Myanmar, Nepal, Netherlands, Nigeria, Pakistan, Panama, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Tunisia, Turkey, United Arab Emirates ates, United Kingdom, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Venezuela, Vietnam, New Zealand, Chile.

Product Introduction:
Anytime APP, as a dedicated receiving terminal for CGMS (Continuous Blood Glucose Monitoring System), can be downloaded and installed on your personal phone from the app store. This application seamlessly integrates with our high-precision sensors and transmitters, providing you with an unprecedented blood sugar management experience.
The Anytime APP provides the following core functions:
Real time blood sugar monitoring: Check your blood sugar levels anytime, anywhere to ensure timely control of blood sugar changes.
Data Storage and Analysis: The application can automatically record and store your blood sugar data, providing detailed data analysis reports to help you better understand your blood sugar status.
Data export: Support doctors or health managers to share your blood glucose data anytime, anywhere, and jointly develop more personalized health management plans.

Disclaimers
Anytime APP is not used to provide diagnosis and screening conclusions of diabetes and cannot replace the suggestions of professional medical staff. Any questions about your physical condition should be raised with your doctor or other qualified professional medical staff. If your reading is too high or too low, or there are other changes related to diabetes in your physical condition, you should follow the routine guidelines proposed by your doctor or other professional medical personnel. Anytime APP does not provide medical services and is not responsible for notifying your doctor or other professional healthcare personnel of any changes in your readings.

BoneBox™ - Dental Lite is the pocket-sized iPhone version of our BoneBox ™ - Dental iPad app. This real-time 3D medical education and patient communication tool, featuring incredibly detailed anatomical models of the human dental anatomy. It is a member of a series of apps developed by a team of anatomists, certified medical illustrators, animators, and programmers using actual human CT imaging data, and the most accurate 3D modeling technology available.
The BoneBox™- Dental Lite is appropriate for use by secondary students, undergraduate and graduate students, and medical professionals.

Interaction with BoneBox™ - Dental Lite utilizes true real-time 3D so the user can place the highly realistic detailed dental anatomy in any position and zoom in to explore all of the anatomical structures. By using the interactive quizzing feature the user will be tested on their knowledge of the human dental anatomy. The user is presented with a random tooth and given 4 multiple choice answers to pick from. 

For additional features and functionality download the BoneBox™ - Dental for iPad.

The glomerular filtration rate (GFR) is an important indicator for the classification of kidney dysfunctions and kidney diseases. With the eGFR app you have the possibility to calculate the GFR from the serum creatinine.

You can choose between the Schwartz formula for children up to 18 years of age and the CKD-EPI, MDRD and Cockcroft formula for children over 18 years of age.

This app also provides information on the individual formulas, how to pre-treat poor GFR values and information on risk minimisation.

Medical decisions should not be made solely based on the information contained in the app. You should seek the advice of a doctor when using this app and before making any medical decisions.

app_name: Bach Mai Care - Hồ sơ sức khoẻ
description:
Ứng dụng Bệnh Viện Bạch Mai giúp bệnh nhân dễ dàng tiếp cận các dịch vụ y tế tại bệnh viện một cách nhanh chóng và tiện lợi. Với ứng dụng này, người dùng có thể:

Đặt lịch khám trực tuyến: Chọn thời gian khám phù hợp, tránh chờ đợi lâu tại bệnh viện. Đặt lịch khám theo nhu cầu với các bác sĩ chuyên khoa của Bệnh Viện Bạch Mai.

Tra cứu kết quả xét nghiệm và hồ sơ y tế: Dễ dàng xem kết quả xét nghiệm, hồ sơ bệnh án và các chỉ số sức khỏe ngay trên điện thoại. Ứng dụng lưu trữ đầy đủ lịch sử khám bệnh và xét nghiệm của bệnh nhân.

Theo dõi lịch sử khám chữa bệnh: Giúp người bệnh quản lý thông tin sức khỏe cá nhân qua các lần khám và điều trị. Dễ dàng kiểm tra lịch sử khám, quá trình điều trị và các chỉ số y tế.

Cập nhật thông tin y tế hữu ích: Nhận thông tin mới nhất về các dịch vụ, chương trình khám bệnh, chương trình tiêm chủng và các hoạt động tại Bệnh Viện Bạch Mai.

Tư vấn trực tuyến: Kết nối với các chuyên gia y tế qua hệ thống tư vấn trực tuyến, hỗ trợ giải đáp các thắc mắc và tư vấn chăm sóc sức khỏe ngay tại nhà.

Vì sao nên chọn ứng dụng của Bệnh Viện Bạch Mai?

Tiết kiệm thời gian: Không cần phải xếp hàng và chờ đợi, ứng dụng giúp bạn đặt lịch và truy cập các dịch vụ y tế một cách chủ động.
Quản lý sức khỏe toàn diện: Lưu trữ và theo dõi lịch sử y tế, giúp người dùng quản lý sức khỏe cá nhân một cách hiệu quả và dễ dàng.
Thông tin bảo mật cao: Ứng dụng được thiết kế đảm bảo bảo mật thông tin cá nhân và dữ liệu sức khỏe của người dùng.
Hãy tải ứng dụng Bệnh Viện Bạch Mai để trải nghiệm các dịch vụ chăm sóc sức khỏe tiện ích và nâng cao chất lượng cuộc sống của bạn. Ứng dụng dành cho mọi lứa tuổi và phù hợp với những ai muốn theo dõi sức khỏe thường xuyên, hỗ trợ người thân hoặc đơn giản là tiết kiệm thời gian khi đến khám tại bệnh viện.

Simple and fast pregnancy wheel available for the iPhone, No need to carry a paper wheel.

The best part is the app is completely free.

Instant access to the latest evidence-based guidance for healthcare professionals.

Updated daily, BMJ Best Practice provides healthcare professionals with the latest evidence-based clinical decision support information. It's available offline, which means clinical decision support can be accessed anytime, anywhere.

This app can be downloaded by those who have access to the BMJ Best Practice website, and have already set-up a username and password.

Don’t have a subscription? Download the app and access a free 7 day trial.

The app provides:

- Fast access to the latest guidance on diagnosis, prognosis, treatment and prevention
- 500+ patient leaflets
- 250+ medical calculators
- Guidance videos on common clinical procedures
- Automatic CME/CPD activity tracking

Your feedback helps to inform future developments. 

At BMJ, we have a user-centered product development process, which means that we enhance the product based on what our customers, and our users tell us they need and want. As a result, we have introduced features such as ‘night mode’ and patient leaflets to the app.

If you have a question or want to provide feedback, please contact us at support@bmj.com. Thank you!

Manage meds, identify pills, check interactions, compare prices and more. Discover detailed, peer-reviewed info on over 24,000 prescription drugs, OTC meds, and natural products all in one place.

Key Features
- My Med List. Create your health profile and track drug interactions, reminders and alerts, with offline access.
- Price Guide. Find the lowest prices for medications and search pharmacies near you.
- Pill Identifier. Identify pills by imprint, color and shape to confirm medications with confidence.
- Interactions Checker. Check potential interactions between prescription medications, OTC drugs, and supplements.
- Q & A. Find answers to thousands of medication-related questions, join support groups or ask a question.
- Compare Tool - Compare any medication side-by-side.
- Side Effects Checker - Access detailed side effect information for thousands of prescription and OTC medications, from common mild reactions to rare severe effects.
- Dosage Information - Reliable dose guidance.
- FDA Alerts - Stay up to date with product recalls, safety alerts, and FDA-related news.
- Health Professionals - Tailored tools and information for medical professionals, including FDA monographs.

Permissions
We request limited permissions to improve your experience:
- Network access: Required to connect to our database.
- Media/Storage: For installation on your local device only, we never access your personal files.
- Your location: Used when you choose to find nearby pharmacies when using the drug discount card.

About Drugs.com
With over 25 million U.S. monthly visitors, Drugs.com is a Webby-nominated health information platform offering peer-reviewed data on more than 24,000 medications. Whether you're a patient, caregiver, or healthcare professional, the app provides reliable tools to manage and understand medication use.

Note: Drugs.com does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Do not rely on this app to replace medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always consult with your healthcare professional.

Support & Subscriptions
Please visit: https://www.drugs.com/apps/support/ for support and feedback, if its subscription related, our team will prioritize your request.

Las ecuaciones para estimar la tasa de filtración glomerular (GFR) son normalmente utilizadas para valorar la función renal. La mayoría de las ecuaciones tradicionales tienen una precisión limitada. Recientemente se ha desarrollado y publicado una nueva ecuación para el cálculo de la GFR. Se trata de la ecuación CKD-EPI que se ha demostrado ser más más exacta que otras ecuaciones más tradicionales. Las variables incluidas en la ecuación CKD-EPI para estimar la GFR son el valor de la creatinina sérica (expresada bien en umol/L o en mg/dL), el sexo, la raza y la edad. En recientes publicaciones de estudios realizados, ha quedado patente que la ecuación CKD-EPI es más exacta que la ecuación del estudio MDRD a lo largo de una gran variedad de poblaciones y condiciones clínicas. Esta mayor exactitud de la ecuación CKD-EPI puede beneficiar la estimación de la función renal en la práctica clínica diaria. 

Esta aplicación le permitirá realizar cálculos de la GFR a través de la ecuación CKD-EPI de una forma sencilla, rápida e intuitiva. Una vez realizados los cálculos, usted podrá enviarse un breve informe a una cuenta de correo electrónico. Además podrá consultar la publicación científica donde se explica el racional para el desarrollo de la fórmula CKD-EPI.

description:

Welcome to AYA – Cry Analyzer, Baby Tracker & Sleep Support
 
Your ultimate companion in early motherhood, AYA helps you understand your baby’s needs with AI-powered tools, smart tracking, and calming support. Effortlessly monitor sleep, feeding, and development milestones — all-in-one daybook app created by parents, for parents.

From first smiles to growth leaps, AYA is your trusted baby center. Our features are science-based and designed to help you feel confident and calm, whether you’re a first-time parent or expanding your already created babylist registry.

CRY ANALYZER & BABY TRANSLATOR

Our innovative crybaby recognition technology deciphers your baby’s first language — crying — and translates it into likely needs such as hunger, discomfort, or fatigue. With up to 96.36% accuracy demonstrated in internal testing, you’ll respond faster and reduce stress.
85% of AYA parents say they calm their baby faster by combining analysis with calming tools like our shusher, lullabies, womb, and nature sounds.

AGE RANGE & USEFULNESS

AYA is ideal for newborns aged 0 to 6 months, but remains helpful through toddlerhood (up to age 2). Whether you’re nursing, pumping, bottle-feeding, or managing daily routines, AYA supports your evolving parenting journey.

MAIN FEATURES

Cry Analyzer & Listener:
Record your baby’s cry and get smart insights — is it hunger, gas, or the need for comfort? Our built-in listener decodes emotions and behaviors quickly and with research-backed accuracy.

Calming Sleep Center:
Soothe your infant with high-quality lullabies, white noise, babyphone sounds, womb ambiance, and nature audio.

Sleep & Activity Tracker:
Log sleep patterns, nap schedule, and new movement skills. Discover your baby’s natural rhythm to build predictable routines.

Feeding & Nursing Log:
Track breastfeeding, nursing, pumping, and bottle feeding sessions to ensure balanced nutrition. This information is also great for syncing with your pediatrician and spotting patterns.

Growth & Size Tracker:
Easily follow your baby’s size, weight, and developmental changes. Log everything from diaper outputs day after day to pediatrician notes in one place, and monitor early risk signs with confidence.

Milestone & Registry Support:
Celebrate firsts — first laughs, first steps — and log everything in your digital diary.

PRIVACY & DATA SECURITY

Your family’s privacy matters. All recordings are encrypted using AES-256. Raw audio is deleted after analysis, and only anonymized data is used to improve results. We don’t share your data — ever.

COMING SOON
- Deeper growth insights and prep tips for every age;
- 24/7 AI assistant for mothers and fathers eager to receive expert-backed guidance.

From the National Kidney Foundation (NKF), this application allows medical professionals to estimate kidney function using five separate eGFR calculators:

- CKD-EPI Creatinine 2021 Equation (Preferred method)
- Revised Bedside Schwartz Formula (For ages 1-17)
- Cockcroft-Gault Formula
- CKD-EPI Cystatin C 2012 Equation
- CKD-EPI Creatinine - Cystatin C 2021 Equation

Also includes information on:

-Glomerular filtration rate (GFR)
-Chronic kidney disease (CKD)
-Clinical use on how to test, evaluate, and slow progression
-Formulas

The National Kidney Foundation is the leading organization in the U.S. dedicated to the awareness, prevention, and treatment of kidney disease for hundreds of thousands of healthcare professionals, millions of patients and their families, and tens of millions of Americans at risk.
By supporting the National Kidney Foundation, you directly influence and positively impact the lives of those at risk for kidney disease, those living with chronic kidney disease, and those who care for and about them.

Learn more at www.kidney.org
30 East 3rd Street
New York, NY 10016
www.kidney.org

My Baby Heart Sounds is a quick and easy way to use your iPhone to listen, record and share your baby's heart sounds.

Not too long ago, we were pregnant mothers too. While our partners enjoyed listening to our babies' sounds by placing their ears on the tummy, we wanted to capture and share these precious audio-memories ourselves. We tried voice memo apps and other sound-recording apps but felt that there was something more we could do to improve the quality of the sound in a simple setup. Fast forward a couple years and here we are!

Why should you try this app?

- Minimum time to setup. All you need is your iPhone. Simple instructions are provided within the app and we are here to support you all the way.
- High quality sound. Using advanced audio signal processing techniques, we deliver a high quality audio experience that allows you to distinguish your baby's heart sounds. For best results use AirPods.
- Listen for free and only pay when you want to record and share.
- Secure. All recordings are stored on your phone. We do not have any access to your recordings. You decide how you would like to share your recordings.
- Track your pregnancy journey. Get weekly insights on pregnancy symptoms, learn how to read ultrasound scans, monitor contractions, and keep track of your baby’s movements with a kick counter.

For best results:

- Use the app when you are 20-30 weeks or greater pregnant.
- Use the app in a quiet room
- Remove any phone case/shell/cover (the iPhone needs to touch your skin to be able to pick up the sounds)
- Put the phone in Airplane Mode
- Start the app and place the iPhone on your tummy to listen for a clear sound. You may need to try a few different spots. Press "Record" to create a recording
- Use AirPods

My Baby Heart Sounds Disclaimer:

- The My Baby Heart Sounds app is NOT a Medical Device or application. It is NOT in any way suitable for medical opinion, advice or diagnosis, and it is NOT intended to provide any information about the person of use's wellbeing or health.
- The app does NOT backup recordings automatically outside the user's device. It is the user's responsibility to regularly backup their recordings.

The most popular and innovative app of its kind, SnoreLab records, measures and tracks your snoring and helps you to discover effective ways to reduce it.

SnoreLab has monitored more than 50 million nights of sleep and has helped millions of people to better understand or even eliminate their snoring problem.

The app is very easy to use: simply set SnoreLab running next to your bed whilst you sleep. In the morning you will discover your Snore Score, exactly when and how loudly you snored, and listen to some highlights!

SnoreLab lets you log and track lifestyle factors and any snoring remedies so you can see how they impact your snoring.

SnoreLab is attracting endorsements from doctors, dentists and users alike. The app can be useful in medical consultations when investigating sleep disorders such as sleep apnea.

Are you a room shaker or a snorter? A buzz saw or a whistler? Or do you just purr like a kitten? Discover the truth with SnoreLab! What's your Snore Score?

'An ingenious app' - Mail Online

'Best Health App - Runner-up' - Best App Ever Awards 2014

FEATURES:

▷ Snore Score: Measures snoring intensity to help you track your snoring over time.
▷ Breathing Analysis: BreathFlow™, SnoreLab’s unique measure of breathing stability correlated with apnea severity, analyzes sound patterns to detect indicators of irregular breathing. 
▷ Breathing Rate: Tracks your respiratory rate and identifies possible breathing interruptions.
▷ Nightly Comparison: See how your snoring changes from night to night.
▷ Remedy Testing: Measure how snoring remedies or lifestyle changes affect your results.
▷ Lifestyle Impact Tracking: Understand how factors like alcohol influence your snoring.
▷ Apple Health Integration: Syncs sleep and body stats seamlessly with Apple Health.
▷ Sleep Stats & Trends: Records detailed sleep metrics for better insights.
▷ Full-Night Recording: Continuous snore recording for deeper analysis.
▷ Share Recordings: Email snore sound files easily.

▷ Simple & Intuitive: Easy to set up and use every night.

AWARDS:

Whether you’re monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, A1C, or weight, this app provides the tools you need for better diabetes management and overall health tracking.
Supporting both mg/dL (American system) and mmol/L (British system), our app ensures global compatibility for your blood sugar log conversions.


Core Features

* Reminders for Logs: Stay consistent with your health tracking using custom reminders. 
* Notification Popups: Get timely alerts to ensure you never miss important updates or logs.
* Dark Mode Support: Reduce eye strain with our sleek and stylish dark mode.
* View & Generate Reports Instantly: Generate and view detailed health reports with ease.
